Good afternoon Pierre-Antoine,

 

Please find attached the renewal policies for Travelers General Liability, Auto Liability, and Umbrella. Kindly review them for accuracy and let us know if any changes or updates are required.

 

Also attached are the invoices for the first installment of all three policies.

chunks.text:
Also attached are the invoices for the first installment of all three policies. These policies are set up for quarterly installments, with the next installment invoice scheduled for 04/01/2024.

 

Please note that the remittance details have changed from the prior EPIC team. I’ve included a printout showing where payments should be directed, and this information is also listed on each invoice under our EPIC logo.

 

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out.

 

Thank you!

 

Best regards,

 

 

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FwT4oCqMy4T81lYZHNtxHEZZxi%3Fdomain%3Depicbrokers.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C8a8327c8200c49acd0a008dd070d4aed%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638674476373984598%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ZabD89ZssiImXbLoAFGRBTzXmVBhxEYUVgek2Etkk2M%3D&reserved=0>
